Please grant root access to use kernel tuning features. Make sure your device is rooted with Magisk.

This will save all CPU, GPU, RAM, thermal settings, and device information.

GPU renderer switching depends on ROM support:
‚Ä¢ Custom ROMs (Pixel Experience, LineageOS) ‚Ä¢ AOSP-based ROMs ‚Ä¢ ROMs with unlocked build.prop
‚Ä¢ Stock ROMs (MIUI, ColorOS, OneUI) ‚Ä¢ SELinux enforcing + locked props ‚Ä¢ Hardcoded renderer in vendor HAL
ROM hardcodes renderer in vendor HAL
üí° Tip: Verify after reboot with: adb shell dumpsys gfxinfo
You are about to change the GPU renderer:
‚Ä¢ System reboot required ‚Ä¢ May not work on all ROMs ‚Ä¢ Stock ROMs often lock this setting
Changes will take effect after system reboot
GPU control is not available on MediaTek devices due to hardware limitations.
GPU control not available on MediaTek devices

Set swap file size (max 16 GB). Set to 0 to disable swap.

Xtra Kernel Manager requires root access to function properly. Please grant root permission through your root manager (Magisk, KernelSU, etc) and try again.
‚Ä¢ Magisk: Enable superuser for this app\n‚Ä¢ KernelSU: Add this app to allow list\n‚Ä¢ APatch: Grant root permission

First, you need to install the OverlayFS module. This is required for the DT2W fix to work.\n\nAfter installation, your device will automatically reboot. Then return here to install the DT2W fix.
Now install the Fix DT2W module. This will enable Double Tap to Wake functionality.\n\nAfter installation, your device will automatically reboot.
This will remove both Fix DT2W and OverlayFS modules.\n\nYour device will reboot automatically to apply changes.
